subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: O. J. Mayo shook his head when asked what his life would be like if he had chosen to wait until after his senior year at Huntington (W.Va.) High to figure out where to play college basketball.
snippet: O. J. Mayo shook his head when asked what his life would be like if he had chosen to wait until after his senior year at Huntington (W.Va.) High to figure out where to play college basketball.
